product_name: Hincapie Sportswear Arenberg Knee Warmers - Men's
long_description: The men's Hincapie Arenberg Knee Warmers provide thermal insulation and revolutionary two-sided silicone grippers that keep the warmers on your legs and in contact with your bike shorts. Soft, supple elastic-knit fabric insulates and wicks moisture away from the body. Soft SlipNot(TM) 2-sided silicone grippers keep warmers in place and in contact with shorts. Ergonomic, articulated knees fit the body in ride position. Hincapie Arenberg Knee Warmers also feature grippers on the lower openings and are shorter in length than the Arenberg leg warmers.
short_description: The men's Hincapie Arenberg Knee Warmers provide thermal insulation and revolutionary two-sided silicone grippers that keep the warmers on your legs and in contact with your bike shorts.
